title: Ticket #4565: condor_config_val stops after the first undefined variable
description:
When listing multiple config variables with condor_config_val, it will not print any values after the first undefined variable:

# condor_config_val CONDOR_HOST FAKE_VARIABLE FULL_HOSTNAME
hcc-marian.unl.edu
Not defined: FAKE_VARIABLE

# condor_version
$CondorVersion: 8.3.1 Aug 09 2014 PRE-RELEASE-UWCS $
remarks:
This appears to be fixed:

# condor_config_val CONDOR_HOST FAKE_VARIABLE FULL_HOSTNAME fermicloud068.fnal.gov Not defined: FAKE_VARIABLE fermicloud068.fnal.gov # condor_version $CondorVersion: 8.6.13 Jan 16 2019 $ $CondorPlatform: X86_64-CentOS_7.6 $
creator: blin
